Response: The lecture part was a bit long and there was not enough practice time for the problems.
I think 5 minutes was too much time for the first two practice exercises.

I think the material was very practical. They overlapped with Mike Frank's class in 251 though so I imagine a lot of the psych students are comfortable with this. The pacing between talking and practice sessions was better than last time.
I thought the class went well. The explanations I valued most were the reasons why things did not work.
